news.title: UK expected to approve plans for Chinese mega embassy
news.summary: A final decision has not yet been formally taken but the controversial project is expected to be given the go-ahead.

news.title: Households face unexpected rise in energy prices in new year
news.summary: Regulator Ofgem says a change in the price cap in January means a 0.2% increase in gas and electricity prices.

news.title: Trump's growing impatience to end Ukraine war is a concern for Kyiv
news.summary: The US is working to a quick timetable to push through the deal, which appears to heavily reflect many of Moscow's demands.

news.title: The curious case of why Poundland is struggling during a cost-of-living crisis
news.summary: Why - in an age where so many of us are feeling the financial pinch - are some budget shops on UK high streets having such a tough time?

news.title: Anti-Hamas armed groups seek future role under Gaza peace plan
news.summary: Several groups - some of them backed by Israel - are ranged against Hamas in Gaza, with complex and overlapping ties.

news.title: Strictly star arrested on suspicion of rape
news.summary: Hertfordshire Police said the man had been released on bail under investigation.

news.title: Gove apologises after Covid report alleges 'toxic' culture in No 10 during pandemic
news.summary: The ex-senior minister apologises for mistakes in the pandemic, but defends some of the previous government's actions.

news.title: Pupils abducted from Catholic school in fresh Nigeria attack
news.summary: Security forces have launched operations to assess the situation and locate the missing pupils.

news.title: Sweaty Betty offers woman £4k for ‘wear the damn shorts’ slogan use and her silence
news.summary: Georgina Cox wants clothing firm Sweaty Betty to apologise and pay influencers it works with fairly.

news.title: Eurovision changes rules after Israel voting controversy
news.summary: There are new rules about government campaigns, as well as the number of votes each fan can cast.
